createTable.remarks: This table contains all event attendance status options.

column.name: status_id
column.remarks: Serial numbers of participant statuses in the database.

changeSet.id: Linking a column of status identifiers to statuses
changeSet.author: poostotel
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE participants ADD FOREIGN KEY (participant_status) REFERENCES participant_statuses(status_id);

createTable.remarks: The table stores all the roles available to the user in the application.

column.name: role_id
column.remarks: Serial numbers of user role in the database.

changeSet.id: Linking a column of role identifiers to roles
changeSet.author: poostotel
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE users ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_role) REFERENCES user_roles(role_id);
